Title: The Snapper
Actors: Colm Meaney, Tina Kellegher, Ruth McCabe, Eanna MacLiam
Plot: Set in Ireland, Sharon Curley is a 20 year old living with her parents and many brothers and sisters. When she gets herself pregnant and refuses to name the father, she becomes the talk of the town.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 10 wins & 3 nominations.
